description:
This course is to take aspiring hip-hop songwriters to the next level! This course will cover:

  • Understanding WHY you're writing your music
  • Styles of writing your music
  • Subject matter
  • Different ways of getting your material from your brain to the page
  • Chorus etiquette
  • reasons why drafting and re-writing are CRUCIAL to the songwriting process
  • Ways to organize and manage all of your lyrics.

This course is an essential piece to every hip hop songwriter looking to make improvements in their abilities to create music. I GUARANTEE that you'll leave this course with new and effective knowledge. My goal is to get you to form an understanding of these writing concepts, then experiment with the knowledge and develop your own unique style.
title: Lyricology: The Perfect Formulas for Hip-Hop Songwriting!
